evidence_example.title: FRSH Coverage test - multi IRQ
evidence_example.small_descr: This test calls all the FRSH primitives obtaining a good coverage.
evidence_example.long_descr: This test calls all the FRSH primitives obtaining a good coverage. It can be used to learn how to program a FRSH application. It contains 6 tests each one stressing a part of the source code. The coverage and timings have been taken using lauterbach trace32. The demo uses 4 IRQ sources for the FRSH timers.
